DeiApplicationArea.description: A DEI application area used to collect information about whether a particular question was asked, responded to, and additional information. It also contains the response information under the Response fields.

askedStatus.title: Asked Status
askedStatus.description: A code referring to how this question was asked. The value for this field should be drawn from the Asked Status codelist.

replyStatus.title: Reply Status
replyStatus.description: A code referring to the status of the reply to this question. The value for this field should be drawn from the Reply Status codelist.

availableOptions.title: Available Options
availableOptions.description: Code(s) referring to options which were available when the question was asked. The value for these codes should be drawn from the Available Options codelist.

additionalDetails.title: Additional Details
additionalDetails.description: A free text field to include any additional details or rationales that may be important to this context.

response.title: DEI Response
response.description: A response to a DEI Application area, containing information such as the taxonomy codes selected and any lived experience or geography responses.

taxonomyCodes.title: Taxonomy Codes
taxonomyCodes.description: The Taxonomy Codes selected from the DEI Taxonomies. The value for these codes should be drawn from the Taxonomy Codes codelist.

livedExperience.title: Lived Experience
livedExperience.description: A free text description of other types of lived experience that is not drawn from the Taxonomy.

geography.title: Geography
geography.description: A free text description that is not drawn from a vocabulary but instead relates to a particular geographical area.

deiDetails.title: DEI Details
deiDetails.description: The DEI Details for this grant. Contains information about separate application areas and the responses to them.

deiVersion.title: DEI Data Standard Version
deiVersion.description: The version of the DEI Data Standard that this data uses e.g. 1.1

purposes.title: Purposes
purposes.description: The purposes of collecting this data.
